attributes.action: Stop people starting petitions just because they're upset
attributes.background: Petitions should be in relation to matters of great public significance.  There should be a statutory filter of petitions to ensure that matters of trivial concern do not proceed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
